caption: I enjoyed the salad, but SweetGreen has a little bit of an edge in terms of choices, flavors, and quality of the ingredients.  But I would definitely eat here again and the location was clean and the staff friendly.
Found a longgggg hair inside my salad. It was distributing and disgusting.
Love salads from here
One of my favorite salad places. Ingredients are fresh and tasty. Acoustics for ordering arenot the best. Sometimes hard to hear and be heard when ordering.

Chopt is always a good healthy option in the ChinaTown area. glad to see they are surviving during COVID. they have tons of options, and are always consistent. they work hard to get you in and out on a work lunch, and they have never messed up my order!
I love this place so much. This place has a cool atmosphere.
I love this place. Very good selections and the salads are delicious.
A great stop for healthy dishes.

I visited this location again after writing an average review 8 months ago.  The manager personally explained why I felt belly discomfort with my salad choice on my initial visit.  He gave me other options and I absolutely loved his recommendation.  I will visit when I am in the neighborhood!  Thanks again for a great salad experience.
So creative! Fresh and tasty Salads!
Delivery is always confusing.
Sooo good and so much to choose from!!
Delish!!!
The bestttt salad place! You will see REALLY HARD WORKING PEOPLE! And the salads are delicious
Stay a way, over priced, cheap greens, too much kale in everything, up charges for chicken, avocado, and feta cheese.  Ate half and threw the rest out.
Literally I hate veggies but these veggies. #BombDotCom

Sorry for the pics.  They may be disturbing to some. But to some others...yall know what it is!! That salad was bangin! Alas, I ate it so quickly that the other pictures i have are of an empty container. Random. But they have these cool frosted forks which are super dope and super comfortable to eat from. I got the Kebob Cobb with olives. As you can tell from the picture it was absolutely amazing! Jammed packed with flavor and very filling. Chopt makes you want to eat salad every day!
Love this place! Very good salads and wraps. Fresh ingredients and lots of options... reasonably priced for the dc area.
Food is good. Servers need to be more friendly.
Not that I love it. There's no need for lower stars. The store is clean, ordering is orderly and its fast. Just expensive

Whole experience is one huge "Meh." I haven't tried other locations yet, as this is the closest to my work, but here they over-chop salads to the point the entire thing is so bland you can't taste any of the ingredients individually. I'm honestly surprised they don't just put your salad in a blender. Also, building your own salad is at least $4 more expensive than getting a preset one despite having the same number/type of toppings (I'm talking the basics/veggies, not adding the premiums) and if you want to switch out one item expect an upcharge for that too, again even if it's not a premium topping. So as long as you like what they have on the menu exactly and also like your salad chopped into pieces finer than sand then I guess this is the place for you.
Fresh food
First experience here, was fantastic.  Dare I say better than sweet greens?  Very good.

I really hate to do this because I absolutely love Chopt. After I paid for the salad and was waiting for it to be mixed, I saw a mouse run through the kitchen. I didn't want to startle the other customers or make anyone feel awkward, so I just paid for the salad and left. I obviously couldn't stomach eating the salad, so I threw it away immediately and will not be returning to the Chinatown Chopt.
Seems like they have changed and added cost but not value.
Excellent
I have always loved this place...My dog is slays perfect...it's the dressing!
Salads are good. Can be healthy depending on what u get. The Asian salad is great!...my salad was almost gone...so good!!
So many options.  Clean and friendly staff
It was just ok. Not like when it first opened.
No communication error, just not listening.  Was over charged for food. Second bad experience at this Chopt since new staff.
Good food. Prices are way too high.
(Translated by Google) I loved the recommend.  (Original) Me encantó la recomiendo.
Health food
Great lunch on the go. The line moves quick
My place to go when i free like buying a big bowel of the greens never have i or been where they have over 30 different salad dressing.

When Chopt first came to my work neighborhood, I  wasn't wowed by the idea. However, I am a big salad eater and so I  gave Chopt a try about 2 years after it opened. I  really like thow fresh the ingredients are as well as the option to build your own salad, especially since I have been trying to be  more mindful about my food choices. The staff here are really nice. They are very customer oriented and want to make you walk away happy. If you can wait for a late lunch, you can avoid the long lines. Or you can always use the app/online ordering to skip the line altogether.

Service was not good, the employees seemed uninterested in being there. I walked in notice the renovation and inquired about when it took place. I was barely given an answer and nobody knew. Customer service should be highly implemented at this location. I will not be returning. The only reason I went today was due to the fact of it being the closest Chopt to my house. I usually go to the one in Navy Yard where they provide excellent customer service.
Even though the lines are long it moves very fast. I'm always pleased with my salad.

The older woman chopping my salad wasn't being very sanitary, she wiped the white paddle that's used for pushing the salad, across the seat of her pants, which was gross, especially for a $22 salad. When I told the manager he acted rude as he gave me tge refund and said he'd need to see the camera. Not eating at the Gallery Place Chopt again for sure.
One of my go-to spots for dinner (less busy than lunch)! And the staff is super friendly
Mexican caesar salad with chicken is my favorite.
manager knows the regulars names and is always helpful

They were absolutely great!!!! To be honest, I was one of those "last minute" customers, not realizing that someone may need to catch the last train or even just get home to their family or just plainly relax... But with no hesitation, they still made my salads with the same great care as if I came during lunch!!!!  Wonderful and pleasant staff, which is a absolute plus!!! Thanx to them again!!!

The service was horrible instructions were not followed. The manager TONY was called and he was rude and over talked my co worker when we called to complain. the issue was not resolved after we purchased 6 salads. I will NEVER ORDER FROM THIS LOCATION AGAIN. TONY IS THE WORST AND HE REALLT NEEDS SOME CUSTOMER SERIVCE CLASSES. I work at and large hospital in DC and I'm going to spread the word to avoid ordering Chopt in the future. Thanks for NOTHING TONY!!! I didn't want to give a one star. the star should be negative zero.
Really good salad, fresh ingredients. Great for pickup food, few tables to serve there.
Interesting concept. Make your own salad. Fast, friendly service. Decent prices.
Why did they take steak off the menu
Excellent attention.

All of the warm bowls are served with rice. I had to return my bowl. In every bite it felt like I was eating little pebbles.  The staff was happy to replace my bowl with a salad.  I was told the rice got hard because it "dried out" on the warmer.
The crispy chicken salad is so good
I love the classic cobb salad I may add very clean !
Good fresh salad. Somewhat expensive but typical of customizable food options.
Service was a little slow, my dressing was out. Must have been a busy day, over all still enjoyed my salad.

I've ordered 4 different times throughout the last 4 weeks, approximately $30 on each order. On each occasion the orders for ALL salads were improperly made. Very dry salads, whole pieces of vegetables and salad mix even with VERY explicit instructions. The "manager" Manni wasn't helpful and did not provide any solutions. DO NOT order through any delivery service, most of all go to another CHOPT location.  BEWARE!

Well the line is always super long but if you try to order ahead on the app they are almost never ready at the time you request them. Also, apparently the app let me order a seasonal salad they don't make anymore and somehow that was my fault according to the store. Prices have gone up so much recently so won't be going here anymore since average salad price is ~$10.50 pre tax now a days.
Enjoyed their fresh finely chopped salads that I much prefer than having to cut up big chunks of lettuce.  All ingredient just meld together.
Great big salads, reasonable prices and friendly staff!!
Always great food
Great service, good food and music. 5stars -Courtney
It was pretty expensive and I wasn't impressed.
Chopt Salad has the best salad but it is expensive but it is good
One of the most awesome places to go I’m fascinated by the way these guys create your custom designed salads in front of you It’s art at a speed that’s mind mind blowing Salads are epic‼️‼️
Great trendy salad shop to order and go, or eat in.  A bit pricey ($15/pp with a drink).

(Translated by Google) The salads are very rich and can be prepared to suit the client. Good dressings, intense flavors. We were attended by a very nice Latin boy who spoke Spanish. I hope to return on an upcoming visit to Washington.  (Original) Muy ricas las ensaladas, se pueden preparar al gusto del cliente. Buenos aderezos, sabores intensos. Nos atendio un chico latino muy amable que hablaba español. Espero vover en una próxima visita a Washington.
(Translated by Google) Excelept  (Original) Excelept

My favorite place to eat now if I'm downtown or in Rockville, with 1 location in Congressional plaza and many downtown in the district. The portions are enough for two people I think. I am a larger guy and I like to eat and that salad fills me up and sometimes makes me stuffed. A salad usually cost me a little over $10 but like I said the sizes large and I definitely think it's worth the cost. I don't like the drinks because there are more natural type of drinks and there's a lot of lemon and ginger and nothing that you would normally think of like as in terms of soda like Coke or Pepsi so I tend to just drink water. If you want Bread they give you a piece of bread Italian bread on the side. They employees are always friendly they welcome you and I've never had a bad experience there. I wish that they would expand more into Prince George's County and up into Baltimore County.

Chopt is a great stop for a lunch that isn't greasy in Chinatown. They use fresh, tasty ingredients, and the serving sizes are large enough that a single salad is usually enough for two meals. Staff at this location are quick and friendly and they have a decent amount of seating.
Awesome fresh ingredients

I have to say, I do like their salads for the most part. My complaints are the boring proteins and the price. I know they are focused on veggies and do well but I find all the varieties of chicken to be kinda dry and tasteless. As for the price, I for one enjoy some avocado and egg on my salad but cant afford a $15 salad. Its just not worth it IMO
Great salads !!!
Great salads, even tho I get the same salad every time lol
Salads were great. Everyone in my party was happy with their choices. This place was easy to find and walk to. Service was quick and friendly.
Get to create your own salad and they chop it up for you really small make it easier to chew great atmosphere large selection

Chopt is always great, and has awesome salad choices. I got a new spicy Cesar salad and enjoyed it very much. They are GF friendly and vegan friendly. It seems like a place you can always take a diverse group of people, and be sure they can all eat.
It's an ok salad shop...but the flavor is just not there.
I really enjoyed the place.
Great place to eat!
Excellent value and quality.    Staff were very fast and hard working.   Store was clean and bright.
I like the variety and the special regional offers. We wish they changed the regions more frequently.
Amazing workers but terrible uptight customers
Get your fresh salads here.  Lots of choices!

Salads are great.  I love the ability to customize my salad and use some of the more premium options like friend onions, avocado, etc.  It is pricey if you think about how much a bag of salad is.  This locations staff is friendly and if you go often enough will remember you and sometimes your order!
Great fresh salads and plenty of choices. Just a tad expensive though
Hands down this place have the best salads I've ever had so far! I'm totally addicted to the Cobb salad with extra chicken. If I could eat their salads every day I would.

The woman who put together my salad had no sense of desirable ratios. My salad was 90% spinach and despite adding 6 toppings, I could barely find them. I also couldn't taste the dressing. It was the kind of salad that makes people hate salads. Complete waste of $14.
(Translated by Google) Interesting idea but too expensive  (Original) Idea interessante ma troppo caro
Been here twice both salads and wraps are good and more than enough food. It is a great place for a quick bite to eat.
Healthy food
Great salad and bread. Wish they had these in Tampa!
Salad was good. But the service was poor. Staff forgot to give us the full combo meal. Just gave us the salad. Later on we had to go and ask for it
I love this place.  Convient.  Right off the metro.  And it's open late. Love the service.  It is a little pricey but you are paying for quality and quantity.
Quick service, but presented in an at times needlessly confusing style. Food I had was good
Excellent quick servive, nice selection of salad toppings
Love the salad selections
The best salad you'll ever have

This place has really great salads but I drove all the way from Maryland to get a salad and they were close at 1032pm. Why is this such a problem? The internet said they would open until 11pm. So basically Chopt ruined my late dinner plans!!

Here, they take your choice of ingredients (or just choose a type of salad from the menu) and create a huge, finely chopped salad. Very filling and delicious; price is a little high, but pretty reasonable considering the quality.
(Translated by Google) Delicious salads  (Original) Ensaladas deliciosas
The salad was diced so finely you couldn't taste the different ingredients in the salad. Staff was very rude and unpleasant. I would never go to this place again.
Really good service
Great food. Fantastic place to visit if you have a food allergy or strict diet. !
Way more specialized on Salad than I am used to, but good and the staff was very friendly and helpful
Usually very busy during lunch hours but any other time you can find a seat.  Workers are very friendly
Fast service even with long lines.
I used to frequent this location when I was stationed in the area and everything tasted great but it was kind of pricey. But the salads were very filling. Overall great place.
Very delicious!
Great great. Good selection and nice team.
Great tasty salads but a bit pricy. I'm not a salad person myself but really enjoyed this place. I'm not sure if chopping the salad does anything or it's just a marketing gimmick.
Would eat here every day
The best place to eat salad for affordable price.
Good salad. Stupidly expensive
Awesome salad and wrap restaurant.  Been going to all their locations in DC for years.
I can't get enough. This is a great alternative to eating unhealthy food during the week.
I love their salads. They make eating a salad interesting and delicious.
Delicious.  So.  Many Choices.  There is a quality variety of ingredients. Know what you want before you go; otherwise, you might face some slightly impatient staff.
Great alternative to fast food because it's healthy and there's a lot of variety.
First time and will not be my last. Great fast casual salad option. Healthy plenty of toppings. Location had great staff and service. Everyone was friendly and spoke to me.
So many choices for salad toppings.
Chop't has the best salads anywhere! Definitely recommend stopping by and grabbing one, and this location is open relatively late which is convenient for a healthy later evening snack or meal.
Always polite and hospitable while making food. Good price for portions.
Never knew a salad could fill me up so much.  Kind of pricey, but the ingredients are good and you get a big portion.
Great food. No parking

I give it a four for the food and a two on service and price. The very hearty Spicy New Mexican Caesar with chicken, avocado and jalapeños was great- with a kick that warms you. But add a small tea and it's over $15. The staff is only marginally helpful: if you miss the recyclable bowls on the way in, they put the salad in a nearly-unopenable  plastic contraception. And when I asked the cashier for a fork at the back of the building, she sent me all the way to the front, despite the fact that there ways a tray of the exact same for to go orders right behind her. I'll come back when in the area despite the issues- and maybe opt for a cheaper order.
Good food, friendly staff, and prompt service.
Love this place! Food for all walks of life, Vegans to meat eaters.
Love this place - I eat here every time I come to DC. Classic Cobb wrap is bonkers.  Please expand to the Seattle area!
The Salads are very good but since they changed their drinks, the drinks are horrible.
Always good. Dependable fast casual.
Love all the choices!
When I go anywhere near the Verizon Center Chop't is where I always grab lunch/dinner.  Great variety of salads that are fresh and filling.  A bit pricey for a casual salad but highly recommend.

The staff was very rude and while I do not mind when workers can't speak english I do mind when they make fun of me because they didn't understand what I am asking for.  I asked for the Kebab Cobb without the yogurt. They looked at me confused so I point to the menu with the ingredients and state I want the Kebab Cobb without the yogurt. They then grab someone that could understand me and I repeat myself once more and then she goes on trying to scold me saying that it's not yogurt, it's tzatziki generating chuckles from her coworkers.  *sarcasm*  I must have not understood the menu correctly when it stated it comes with Tzatziki Yogurt. I should be ashamed of myself for thinking Tzatziki is yogurt. I was clearly wrong.  To be clear this was only a group of 3 individuals. The rest of the staff were incredibly friendly and happy to be of service. But those 3 ruined it for the rest of you hard workers.  What is a shame is that I was only a customer because Chop't repeatedly got my girlfriend's order wrong and it became so bad that the head honcho for this region out of New York felt they had to contact her to apologize and gave her a $10 coupon as an apology. Which she gave to me hoping my experience wouldn't be so bad. I should also note that my experience was at a completely different Chop't from where she had her problems.  There seems to be a very large divide between what Chop't thinks is a good customer experience and what the line cooks in their stores think is a good customer experience. Until this is fixed, I don't see myself as a customer ever again.  Also, the "kebab" tasted like grilled chicken breast not kebab meat. I'm not sure if they just gave me grilled chicken or not but it was dry and not tasty. The rest of the salad was good though.
(Translated by Google) Delicious  (Original) Riquisimo
Very quick service
I haven't been to Chop't during rush hour, so I can't speak to the wait time, but the salads are very good and the options are amazing! Definitely worth a visit.
Healthy salads, all calories posted
Great place. They are always crowded but do a great job getting you in and out.
They stupidly have tofu and falafel in front, meat in the back, so there's frequently bits of meat in the vegetarian protein options.
I enjoyed the salads. I would love to come back for more!
Decent service, good food & a nice atmosphere
Food was good but definitely not worth the terrible service I recieved. Honestly the employees were so rude and unpleasant that I was tempted to just walk out without any food at all.
The bacon ranch dressing on the steak salad is the bomb!!
This is a busy and weird Chop't location. Everything moves fast though. Also, it is clean overall.

I don't eat salads. I hate salads. Salads & I are not on friendly terms.  I LIKE CHOP'T.  Amazing, I know! Trust me, my friends are amazed! Truly a feat of miracle! Although I usually pre-order & go pick up my food, I like the set-up in the actual establishment, a little salad assembly line. As my friend says, "Chop't is like the Chipotle of salads." The ingredients here are always fresh, bright & colorful & never wilted, very inviting, and the staff is typically friendly, patient & helpful.  My favorite salad here is the Monterey, although I prefer it in "salad sandwich" (a.k.a. wrap) form because, as I said, salads aren't always my favorite (which is an understatement). Try it with corn & the smoky sweet chipotle vinaigrette. They've also got some unknown brand of soft drinks, chips & cookies -- all of which are EXTREMELY tasty. Don't be turned off by the brands you've never heard of! Yummm.  I give Chop't only 3 stars because they kind of suck at putting together multiple pre-orders. We like to joke around my office that they get all the right ingredients in, but not necessarily where they belong. We'll sit around our lunch table yelling out stuff like, "Hey, there are apples in mine! Whose apples do I have?" and someone else will call back, "Oh, those were supposed to be my apples. Whose croutons are these?" Needless to say, we haven't placed any large Chop't orders lately. That said, if all you're ordering is something for yourself, it's worth it.  Also, if you place a pick-up Chop't order before 11 a.m., you get one topping free - SCORE!
love this place...best salad in town. We eat at chopt almost twice a week with my friends always have had Excellent salads.love the food.

Soooo I don't know why but i have had the worst luck with this chopt location. From bugs in my salad to waiting for my food to be delivered for two hours! I love the salads and i am not a complainer but today was just the last straw for me.  The first issue was the dead fly in my salad... it was a very disgusting surprise. I quit ordering from them for about 5 months .  Then after the 5 months I gave them another chance and this time i found a beetle in my salad.... those thick long legs scared me off . I emailed their main office about it and they were actually very nice and apologetic about it. They were so nice about it that I went back to chopt for my lunches the next day. It was a while before I stopped inspecting every bite before i put it in my mouth but i got over it eventually.  Today I ordered my salad for delivery early this morning at 11am sharp so that it would arrive at my office by 12 at the latest.Well its 1:28 and i still don't have my salad, I called twice and they had no explanation ..... so I just ended up canceling it all together .  SWEETGREEN you have got yourself a new customer ! I give up on chopt . I have the worst luck with them .  UPDATE!!!! so its 3:00pm and the delivery guy finally showed up ! AFTER i already canceled it what is wrong with these people!
So much food. So many choices. So good.
This is great for lunch. It is quick, easy, and healthy.
just order from the menu.  creating your own salad can leave you with compost.
Great Salads!  I hope they come to Wisconsin.  I'd eat a salad a day if they were near my work or home.

Every salad I've gotten so far has been amazing... and I'm not even a salad person!  It also helps that I'm a fan of reggae, which always seems to be playing rather loudly.  Service has been consistently friendly, upbeat, and helpful.

Well deserved lines around the block! But don't let that stop you!  The workers move your order along with lightning speed and a smile.  Besides, you need a few minutes to peruse their mouth-watering menu hanging up on a huge wallboard!  You can order your salad chopped or not or as a wrap.  Great business concept and super fresh ingredients with TONS of fresh vegetables!
